sections.heading: Repealed.Section 69-7-2 - Repealed
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1987, ch. 234, § 84 repealed 69-7-1 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1889, ch. 103, § 1, relating to the record of ore receipts required, effective July 1, 1987. For present comparable provisions,see69-7-2 NMSA 1978.

sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text:
History:Laws 1889, ch. 103, § 2; C.L. 1897, § 2319; Code 1915, § 3477; C.S. 1929, § 88-302; 1941 Comp., § 67-3002; 1953 Comp., § 63-30-2; repealed by Laws 2007, ch. 301, § 18 and Laws 2007, ch. 302, § 18.

Repeals.— Laws 2007, ch. 301, § 18 and Laws 2007, ch. 302, § 18 repealed 69-7-2 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1889, ch. 103, § 2, relating to inspection by owner of stolen ores and filed affidavit, effective June 15, 2007. For provisions of former section,seethe 2006 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.

sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text:
History:Laws 1889, ch. 103, § 3; C.L. 1897, § 2320; Code 1915, § 3478; C.S. 1929, § 88-303; 1941 Comp., § 67-3003; 1953 Comp., § 63-30-3; repealed by Laws 2007, ch. 301, § 18 and Laws 2007, ch. 302, § 18.

Repeals.— Laws 2007, ch. 301, § 18 and Laws 2007, ch. 302, § 18 repealed 69-7-3 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1889, ch. 103, § 3, relating to penalty and damages for refusalal to keep records, make proper entries or permit inspections, effective June 15, 2007. For provisions of former section,seethe 2006 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.

sections.heading: Repealed.

Repeals.— Laws 2007, ch. 301, § 18 and Laws 2007, ch. 302, § 18 repealed 69-7-4 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1889, ch. 103, § 4, relating to failure or neglect to make inquiries for record or negligent entries or to keep record book, effective June 15, 2007. For provisions of former section,seethe 2006 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.

sections.heading: Repealed.

Repeals.— Laws 2007, ch. 301, § 18 and Laws 2007, ch. 302, § 18 repealed 69-7-5 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1889, ch. 103, § 5, relating to purchaser of ore from illegal possessor of mine, deemed accessory, effective June 15, 2007. sections.heading: Repealed.

Repeals.— Laws 2007, ch. 301, § 18 and Laws 2007, ch. 302, § 18 repealed 69-7-6 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1887, ch. 34, § 1, relating to employer's liability for lead poisoning of smelter employee, effective June 15, 2007. sections.heading: Repealed.

Repeals.— Laws 2007, ch. 301, § 18 and Laws 2007, ch. 302, § 18 repealed 69-7-7 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1887, ch. 34, § 2, relating to failure to provide care of lead-poisoned employee, effective June 15, 2007. For provisions of former section,seethe 2006 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.
